channel.title: How to add new items?
channel.description:
How can I add items to my 'item.cfg' file?
I added the item and put the stats and the compiler didn't give any errors but the server didn't run properly.
Thanks, Kristjan*
I used this (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,237928.0.html) tutorial but when I started the 'run server.bat' then the server just kept shutting down. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2008, 10:46:34 AM[/size][hr]Please help.

item.title: How to add new items?
item.dc:creator: @kristjan1 kristjan*
item.description:
@kristjan1 wrote:

How can I add items to my ‘item.cfg’ file?

I added the item and put the stats and the compiler didn’t give any errors but the server didn’t run properly.

Thanks,
Kristjan*

I used this (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,237928.0.html) tutorial but when I started the ‘run server.bat’ then the server just kept shutting down. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2008, 10:46:34 AM[/size][hr]Please help.
